results.description: If you're still not sure how you'll travel, where you'll stay or which countries are on your must-do list, our experts have the perfect solutions, whether you're a student or a career breaker
results.title: Need big ideas for your gap-year adventure?

attachments.caption: Why not try relaxing in a canoe on your gap year. Photograph: Hugh Sitton/Corbis

results.description: The Trading Standards Institute is advising travellers to report travel agents who charge more than the brochure price for holidays after a survey revealed many were doing so illegally.
results.title: Agents hike holiday prices

results.description: Richard Eilers and his father try out a cookery course in Tuscany. Will they end up using the rolling pin on each other rather than the dough?
results.title: Father and son try their hands at cooking in Tuscany

attachments.caption: Richard Eilers and his father, Robert, do their best with spinach and ricotta ravioli at the Villa Segalato cookery course, Tuscany, Italy. Photograph: Richards Eilers

results.description: If you can't make it to the coast, try your local lido. Ashley Norris samples eight in a day.
results.title: The city's beaches

attachments.caption: For urban dwellers, nothing beats a lido in the middle of summer.
